author: nick
msg: Forrest seems to create files with native line endings. To avoid problems going forward, tell SVN that, and get the endings to be consistent. Also fix a few other svn properties

author: kevinwilfong
msg: HIVE-3728. make optimizing multi-group by configurable. (njain via kevinwilfong)

author: brane
msg: (_SVN_XXFLAGS_ADD_IFELSE): Common code for the above two functions.
(SVN_PROG_CC): Replaces AC_PROG_CC and assigns flags that put
the compiler into C90 mode in CMODEFLAGS.
(SVN_PROG_CXX): Replaces AC_PROG_CXX and assigns flags that put
the compiler into C90 mode in CXXMODEFLAGS.

author: kevinwilfong
msg: HIVE-3757. union_remove_9.q fails in trunk (hadoop 23) (njain via kevinwilfong)
